snippet: The suspect is said to have told federal agents that he “was resolved to commit an act of violent jihad.”
abstract: Avionics technician Terry Lee Loewen is charged with plotting to detonate a car bomb at Mid-Continent Airport in Wichita, Kan; he is arrested by federal agents as he is transporting what he thought were explosives toward the airport; officials say Loewen worked alone and planned to to engage in act of violent jihad on behalf of Al Qaeda.
lead_paragraph: The suspect is said to have told federal agents that he “was resolved to commit an act of violent jihad.”

headline.main: Wichita Airport Technician Charged With Terrorist Plot
headline.print_headline: Wichita Airport Technician Charged With Terrorist Plot
